text: Sir Thomas Langton (1496/97–1569), of Newton and Walton-le-Dale, Lancashire, was an English politician. He was a Member (MP) of the Parliament of England for Lancashire in April 1554. ==References== Category:1490s births Category:1569 deaths Category:English MPs 1554 Category:Members of the Parliament of England (pre-1707) for Lancashire
title: Thomas Langton (died 1569)
